attributes.action: Invesigate Sevenoaks Councils bending to Tescos Corporate sway. (Tescos Expansion)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To the Honourable Sir, We the assigned humbly request that you intervene and represent local people standing up against Tesco's corporate strength.

Sevenoaks District Council voted against expansion in March 14:1 and now they have voted in favour by 14:1 why, and what has changed.

Seems a little ominous, and just another example of Sevenoaks District Councils willingness to flout resident opinion.
